contextId.information: This is an important title for Jesus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
At age 12, Jesus, the Son of God, understood that God was his real Father (not Joseph, Mary's husband). (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for Jesus, the Son of God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
The devil challenges Jesus to do this miracle in order to prove that he is "the Son of God" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: If you are the Son of God
